name: Bungalows Club Maspalomas Uno

reviews.text: My family and I stayed in this hotel during Xmas week. My mother is disabled and took here mobility scooter with her. For disabled access this hotel is great as there are ramps everywhere which we were unaware of at the time of booking so it was a real plus. The island does however, have good disabled access in the town centres especially Play del Ingles only 10 mins walk away from the centre and 5 mins in a cab which should cost between 3-4 Euros. The rooms have ample space with a safe of which you have to pay 3 Euros a day, if you have the safe for a week 6 Euros is returned to you.
reviews.title: Clean, quiet and friendly hotel in a nice area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Water in rooms was always very warm but not hot the same for the food which was a bit of a let down as it would be the same selection for breakfast and dinner; Bacon, eggs, beans croissants and fruit, veg, then Fish, Meat and salad a dinner. However, a good selection of fresh fruit. Not much of a selection and many of the guest would eat out. Maid service would be 2-3 times per week and fresh towels wouldn't always be included. You have to pay for the TV in rooms which costs 3 Euros for 24 hrs or 1.50 for 1/2 hr. A bit of a rip off as the only English channel are BBC new 24, Sky news and Dubai TV .
reviews.title: Basic, clean and good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately, the telephones in rooms do not accept incoming calls.
reviews.title: Good Basic Accomodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms had two cooking rings, cutlery, dishes, pots, etc but NO kettle or toaster which you can hire. We carried our own.
reviews.title: Life's a beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are decent but walls are a bit thin. You can here you neighbour.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: The position was great 5 minutes walk from FARO 2, The HOLIDAY WORLD FAIR was even closer,
reviews.title: Spotless and Clean

likes.liked: — That it felt like a little village

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: THE ACCOMODATION was smaller than i thought it would be, 2 Adults and 1 small child was all this bungalow could hold.
reviews.title: Great choice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: THE BUFFET was 9 euros 90 cent ALL YOU CAN EAT which we found great value and ate there several times.
reviews.title: loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was concerned by reviews i had read about rio club maspalomas but when we got there we were really pleased with the bungalow we stayed in. OK it was only rated 1key but it was comfortable very clean and had all we needed. The service from the maids was excellent they cleaned seven days out of the ten we were there (even washed up for us),and the service at reception was excellent nothing was too much trouble. It was well located for the faro2 for meals and bars, and we even had a daily free bus to maspalomas . Other people on the complex were mainly german and spanish but they were polite and friendly . So if you want good clean basic accomodation we would really recommend the rio club maspalomas we would certainly go again :)..........
reviews.title: Loved the place

likes.liked: — It was clean bright friendly nice setting good location

reviews.text: These apartments are OK but they are only 1 key and very basic and I mean basic. We had a rusty old tin opener which you would not want to use as it had years of grime on it. No sharp knife to cut bread or fruit (or maybe this was so you did not slit your wrists ha ha) No wine glasses and what glasses there were there was only 3 and the cot they provided was broken.
reviews.title: A bit disappointed

likes.liked: — The sunbeds provided on the patio of the bungalow
likes.disliked: — small bungalow, ants, cockroaches and rude staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment had an ant problem and the hotels answer was to send the man around with the spray. We got our own in the end and seemed to keep them at bay. I have seen more cockroaches in these apartments than I have in the whole time I have been coming to the Canaries which is 11 years!
reviews.title: Nice Family Hotel

reviews.text: I did not think they were very clean either, the maids (although very nice ladies) did not seem to come very often and when we arrived we had a smelly Tea Towel and the bath towels did not smell very fresh either.
reviews.title: not for brits at this time of year

reviews.text: The hotel reception staff are very rude - you are basically just a number and if you have a problem you are then blacklisted for the rest of the holiday!
reviews.title: Superb

likes.disliked: — Pavements outside resort awkward for pushchairs

aka: Bungalows Club Maspalomas Uno Hotel Maspalomas
